sbp.client.drivers.file_driver module¶

class sbp.client.drivers.file_driver.FileDriver(filename)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.client.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver

The FileDriver class uses a file as an IO source of SBP messages.

filename : string
Path to file to read SBP messages from.
next()[source]¶

Call handle’s iterator.

readline()[source]¶
Readline wrapper: read a line which is terminated with end-of-line (EOL) character (‘

‘ by default), or until timeout.

seek(pos, whence=0)[source]¶

Wrapper around file seek.

pos : int
Position of the read/write pointer within the file.
whence : int
Optional and defaults to 0 which means absolute file positioning, other values are 1 which means seek relative to the current position and 2 means seek relative to the file’s end
